sentences.english: To the East, stark white concrete and armed guards.
sentences.chinese: 而在东面则是森森白墙，荷枪警哨。

sentences.english: “In the future,” he writes, hauntingly, “it will be difficult to die alone.”
sentences.chinese: 他鬼气森森的写到，“未来我们将很难孤独终老。”

sentences.english: The police are scouring the woods for the missing child.
sentences.chinese: 警察正在搜索森森，寻找那个丢失的小孩。

sentences.english: Russia has been scorched by heatwave and its forests incinerated.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯已经被热浪烤焦，森森已经化为灰烬。

sentences.english: The house looked dark and forbidding .
sentences.chinese: 房子黑森森的，令人望而生畏。

sentences.english: The film is in lurid colors, a pulp counterpoint to the elegance of the action.
sentences.chinese: 影片的色彩浓的逼人，森森鬼气呼应着优雅的动作。

sentences.english: The windows of the house stared bleakly down at her.
sentences.chinese: 那座房子的窗户居高临下阴森森地对着她。

sentences.english: Software Description: About Haunted House, This is a dark and spooky haunted house.
sentences.chinese: 这是黑和阴森森受到折磨的房子。

sentences.english: Do you hear it's sepulchral tone ?
sentences.chinese: 你是否听到那阴森森的音调？

sentences.english: "In the future, " he writes, hauntingly, "it will be difficult to die alone. "
sentences.chinese: 他鬼气森森的写到，“未来我们将很难孤独终老。”

sentences.english: Starbuck sees it as a gloomy religious warning.
sentences.chinese: 斯达巴克把它看作是冥冥上苍的一个阴森森的警告。

sentences.english: The houses were white as bones in the moonlight .
sentences.chinese: 月光下，房屋象是白森森的人骨。

sentences.english: Darting, one never knows where, their tenebrous orbs.
sentences.chinese: 阴森森的眼珠不知道盯着什么地方。

sentences.english: The car's headlights pierced the gloom of darkness.
sentences.chinese: 汽车的前灯刺破了阴森森的黑夜。

sentences.english: All ahead islands of dark pine trees rose out of the plain.
sentences.chinese: 前面，黑森森的松树长成一个个孤岛，浮在平原上。

sentences.english: An ancient pagoda frowns on the mountainside.
sentences.chinese: 一座古塔阴森森地矗立在山腰上。

definition: bloody mouth wide open like a sacrificial bowl (idiom); ferocious mouth of beast of prey/fig. greedy exploiter/rapacious aggressor
sound of the wind blowing or rain falling
